import React, { useState } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import Moment from "react-moment"; // Redux import { deleteAccount } from "../../../store/actions/Index"; // Components import Spinner from "../../../layout/Spinner"; import "./AccountSettings.scss"; // To Delete a profile bring in deleteAccount from actions/Index and wire that bitch up const AccountSettings = ({ auth: { user, loading }, deleteAccount }) => { const [showChangePassword, setShowChangePassword] = useState(false); return loading && user === null ? ( ) : (

Welcome {user && user.name}

Collection:

{user && user.savedVids.length === 1 ? `${user.savedVids.length} Clip` : `${user.savedVids.length} Clips`}

Member since:

{user.date}

{showChangePassword ? ( <>
{/*

setShowChangePassword(!showChangePassword)} > x

*/}
) : ( )}
); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ auth: state.Authenticate, profile: state.Profile, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { deleteAccount })(AccountSettings);
